R

ReceiveConnectRequest - Class in behaviours
Responds to Connect Requests from other peers with either yes or no - if yes, add them to a list of peers connected to the Super Peer
ReceiveConnectRequest(SuperPeer) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveConnectRequest
 
ReceiveConnectResponse - Class in behaviours
Connect Request reply from a Super Peer.
ReceiveConnectResponse(Peer) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveConnectResponse
 
receiveFile(String) - Method in class agents.OrdinaryPeer
Inherits the behaviour of all Peers, but additionally schedules a Send File List message.
receiveFile(String) - Method in class agents.Peer
Simulated file transfer - in this case changing the file from state 'wanted' to 'shared'
ReceiveFileList - Class in behaviours
Add a peers shared file list to this super peer's file index.
ReceiveFileList(SuperPeer) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveFileList
 
ReceiveFileRequest - Class in behaviours
Responds by sending the file back.
ReceiveFileRequest(Agent) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveFileRequest
 
ReceiveFileResponse - Class in behaviours
Completes the process of acquiring files - the peer at this point has a file.
ReceiveFileResponse(Agent) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveFileResponse
 
ReceiveNeighborsResponse - Class in behaviours
Adds to knownPeers the response from the Host Cache
ReceiveNeighborsResponse(Peer) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveNeighborsResponse
 
ReceiveNeighboursRequest - Class in behaviours
The Host Cache continually waits for a REQUEST_NEIGHBOURS message.
ReceiveNeighboursRequest(HostCache) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveNeighboursRequest
 
ReceiveNetworkStats - Class in behaviours
Runner receives stats package from peers and adds the data to the stats collections
ReceiveNetworkStats(Agent) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveNetworkStats
 
ReceiveSearchRequest - Class in behaviours
Search requests are either responded to directly (if we have the file) or forwarded using document routing.
ReceiveSearchRequest(SuperPeer) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveSearchRequest
 
ReceiveSearchResponse - Class in behaviours
Receives a Search Response message, and responds in one of several ways.
ReceiveSearchResponse(Peer) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReceiveSearchResponse
 
removePendingPeer(AID) - Method in class agents.Peer
Upon hearing back from a contacted Super Peer, they are removed from the pending peer list.
ReportBehaviour - Class in behaviours
Print some information every interval about the state of the network.
ReportBehaviour(Agent, long) - Constructor for class behaviours.ReportBehaviour
Start by printing how many peers are in the network, and how many are Super Peers
REQUEST_CONNECT - Static variable in interface ontology.P2PVocabulary
 
REQUEST_NEIGHBOURS - Static variable in interface ontology.P2PVocabulary
 
REQUEST_NEIGHBOURS_IS_SUPER - Static variable in interface ontology.P2PVocabulary
 
REQUEST_SEARCH - Static variable in interface ontology.P2PVocabulary
 
REQUEST_SEARCH_FILE - Static variable in interface ontology.P2PVocabulary
 
REQUEST_SEARCH_SENDER_STACK - Static variable in interface ontology.P2PVocabulary
 
RequestConnect - Class in ontology.actions
Peers ask Super Peers if they can connect.
RequestConnect() - Constructor for class ontology.actions.RequestConnect
 
RequestNeighbours - Class in ontology.actions
Asks for some Super Peer IDs, and adds the sender to the host cache.
RequestNeighbours() - Constructor for class ontology.actions.RequestNeighbours
 
RequestSearch - Class in ontology.actions
Search request for a file.
RequestSearch() - Constructor for class ontology.actions.RequestSearch
 
Runner - Class in agents
Runs the simulation, and keeps track of information about the network.
Runner() - Constructor for class agents.Runner
